Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the risk assessment and audit framework for a team meeting.
Host a team meeting to share the final findings of the risk assessment and the audit framework.
Collect feedback from the team on the presented frameworks and address any concerns.
Final adjustments to the audit framework and risk assessment based on team feedback.
Wrap up the week, set goals for next week, and check emails one last time.
